### <span style="color:#2a3ec2;">Install and Launch R Packages</span>

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```

### <span style="color:#2a3ec2;">Importing Data</span>

```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```

### <span style="color:#2a3ec2;">Plotting A Simple Bar Chart</span>

```{r}
ggplot(data = exam_data,aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar()
```
